SELECT ll.id,ll.login_ip,ll.create_time,a.username, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( NAME SEPARATOR " | " ) FROM role WHERE JSON_CONTAINS ( a.role, CONVERT ( id, CHAR ) ) ) AS roles FROM login_log as ll LEFT JOIN admin as a on ll.admin_id = a.id
AND a.username LIKE "%${params.username}%"
AND ll.create_time between #{params.start} and #{params.end}
ORDER BY ll.id DESC
